title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\LoggingConfig
name: LoggingConfig
description:
The runtime logging config of the job.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.LoggingConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.driver_log_levels
params.description: The per-package log levels for the driver. This may include "root" package name to configure rootLogger. Examples: 'com.google = FATAL', 'root = INFO', 'org.apache = DEBUG'

methods.description:
